name: Additional ratio results
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: This extension is used when there are multiple result values for a single Observation Resource.  The first result for this observation is the value[x] element and any additional ratio (e.g. classic titers) results for this observation will go here.

element.formal: This extension is used when there are multiple result values for a single Observation Resource.  The first result for this observation is the value[x] element and any additional ratio (e.g. classic titers) results for this observation will go here.
element.comments: Having a single value for each Observation Resource is preferred.
